Package danogl.gui.mouse

Class MouseActionParams

java.lang.Object
danogl.gui.mouse.MouseActionParams
public class MouseActionParams
extends java.lang.Object
Encapsulated information regarding a mouse action.
Author:
Dan Nirel

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    protected MouseActionParams()
    An empty constructor for use by extending classes
      MouseActionParams​(MouseAction mouseAction, Vector2 mouseScreenPos, MutableVector2 mouseWorldPos, double scrollClicks, MouseButton button)
    An instance of this class is usually created internally by the engine.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    MouseButton getButton()
    If the actions concnerns any of the buttons, this method retrieves it.
    MouseAction getMouseAction()
    Returns the action performed
    Vector2 getMouseScreenPos()
    The current screen-coordinates of the cursor (in pixels)
    Vector2 getMouseWorldPos()
    The current world-coordinates of the cursor
    double getScrollClicks()
    The number of clicks scrolled since the last frame.

    • getScrollClicks

      public double getScrollClicks()
      The number of clicks scrolled since the last frame. Negative values for scrolling down, positive for up.
